about_the_game:
DLC Custom Match Owner
Open up the ability to create rooms to play custom matches and play Abamar with your friends!


This DLC is paid content for free-to-play users.
If you have purchased "Ultimate Super Powers Old Maid ~3Days~" at the time of purchase, you will automatically receive this DLC and the Custom Match function will be opened.
detailed_description:
DLC Custom Match Owner
Open up the ability to create rooms to play custom matches and play Abamar with your friends!


This DLC is paid content for free-to-play users.
If you have purchased "Ultimate Super Powers Old Maid ~3Days~" at the time of purchase, you will automatically receive this DLC and the Custom Match function will be opened.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
